Summary: large triangle noticed over home, altitude 1500 feet, northbound 30mph, silent, 3 red flashing lights in corners 8 inches diameter
trends: There have been no other sightings in Asotin
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsarrived home 10:30pm july 29 2013, exiting car in driveway, clear dark country skies, noticed the huge (football field size) triangle over-flying residence, north-bound. steady speed 30mph, straight track. constant altitude about 1500-feet. hollered to husband to come outside, did not think of camera. quiet country location, carefully listened - zero sound emitted. red flashing lights each corner (3), each seemed the size of car headlight - instant-on\off flashing. no center light\structure. as triangle gained distance, the "far" red light disappeared, apparently obstructed by triangle body. triangle continued steady-speed northbound until out of sight, several minutes clear viewing time. perfect triangle shape and size remained exact. did not notice if "transparent" or obscuring stars - did not pass in front of any significantly bright stars to attract attention to this. feeling is - solid definite craft structure. latitude: +46.1835 longitude: -117.2694
